QoccInputOutput Class Reference

This class provides input/output elements of the QtOpenCascade Toolkit. Currently a "work-in-progress", based on the standard examples. The main lesson learnt here is that with Qt4 you cannot directly cast QString to a "char *", so to transform to a OCC Standard_CString use. More...

Detailed Description

This class provides input/output elements of the QtOpenCascade Toolkit. Currently a "work-in-progress", based on the standard examples. The main lesson learnt here is that with Qt4 you cannot directly cast QString to a "char *", so to transform to a OCC Standard_CString use. 

Standard_CString s = aQString.toAscii().data() ;
Author:
Peter C. Dolbey
